headline.main: ARCHIVES OF NAPLES BURNED BY GERMANS; Historic Records Dating to Eleventh Century Destroyed

lead_paragraph: NAPLES, Nov. 1 (Delayed) -- At Capua, before their retreat, the Germans deliberately destroyed the archives of Naples, it was learned today.
snippet: NAPLES, Nov. 1 (Delayed) -- At Capua, before their retreat, the Germans deliberately destroyed the archives of Naples, it was learned today....

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
